summary: Redeployment of app with content preservation
known_issues: Content from Version 12 not displaying after redeployment - articles, links, pictures missing across tabs

existing_features.title: Ensure frontend properly fetches and displays all content from Version 12 across all tabs (Mission, Latest Progress, X Posts, Ecosystem Spotlight, Investing Wisdom, Trusted Resources, Cybercrime Awareness, and Home Page Links)
Fix any data loading errors or empty states preventing content from displaying in all tabs, ensuring proper error handling and loading states for all React Query hooks
Verify all CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) work correctly for all content types across all tabs

new_feature_requests.summary: Redeploy the current application (Version 12) to production while ensuring all existing backend data is preserved, including articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom entries, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links, and mission content
Verify that the Additional Resources tab, delete buttons across all content types, and home page links with thumbnails (features from Version 12) remain functional after redeployment

Verify backend data persistence for all content types (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom entries, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links, and mission content) and ensure data is being retrieved correctly from the backend actor
